text: Aur yeh tumhara kya haal hai ke jab tumpar museebat aa padi to tum kehne lagey yeh kahan se aayi? Halaanke ( jung e Badr mein) issey dugni (double) museebat tumhare haathon [ fareeq e mukhalif (enemies) par] padh chuki hai. (Aey Nabi)! Insey kaho, yeh museebat tumhari apni layi hui hai, Allah har cheez par qaadir hai
